Package game.adventuregame.model

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.adventuregame.model.Action
  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Models Actions with given name. An action has its name, list of required items to perform that action and certain effects of that action.
    Author:
    Shankar Ammai
    See Also:
    Item, Effect

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Action​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an Action given the name of the action.

      Add given item as required item to perform the action.

      Returns the list of effects of the action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates an Action given the name of the action.

        A newly created item has no required items and has no effects after performing the action.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the action

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the action.
        Returns:
        the name of the action.

      • addRequiredItem

        public void addRequiredItem​(Item item)
        Add given item as required item to perform the action.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to add as required the item to perform the action.

      • isAllowed

        public boolean isAllowed​(Player player)
        Returns if the player is allowed to perform the action.

        A player can perform an action if the player can see all required items.

        Parameters:
        player - Player to check if he can perform the action.
        Returns:
        true if the player can perform the task, false if the player cannot perform the action.

      • addEffect

        public void addEffect​(Effect effect)
        Adds given effect to the action.
        Parameters:
        effect - effect of the action.

      • getEffects

        public java.util.List<Effect> getEffects()
        Returns the list of effects of the action.
        Returns:
        Effects of the action.
